channel.title: Fines and stuff
channel.description:
I can't find solid answers on google so, might as well ask here
How much would a fine be for 2 misdemeanors for a minor, for stealing a 230$ object, with 4 people?
If you tell me the 230$ is divided by 4, you're an idiot. Court fines count too.

item.title: Fines and stuff
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

[quote=“Mendorphins, post:24, topic:388788”][quote author=drubrkletern link=topic=484610.msg3552624#msg3552624 date=1301631788]

Don’t steal shit… Also, if you do don’t post information about it on here because moparisthebest has reported malicious activity to the proper police departments in the past.

Hahahaha remember that kid who smashed windows of cars and posted it on mitb, then mitb reported him to his local authorities!

lol mitb breaks laws but also enforces others

= reporting crimes etc. - hosting a “illegal website” (deemed by jagex) = cancels out, so he can host moparscape and mitb i do my math.
[/quote]
It’s not an illegal website. It’s protected for one thing with the terms and conditions, plus there’s no black market, RS cheating isn’t necessarily illegal, just against the rules (depends how to differ “cheating”).[/quote]
When i said “deemed” well i guess i actually meant like in Jagex’s eyes but yeah, mitb did pwn those lawyers Jagex really cant do anything

Read full topic

item.title: Fines and stuff
item.dc:creator: @Wildyscape562 Wildyscape562
item.description:
@Wildyscape562 wrote:

Yeah, i started getting in alot of trouble about 3 years ago, now i pay my own fines lol parents got sick of it… im beginning to get sick of it too

Read full topic

item.title: Fines and stuff
item.dc:creator: @Mack_n_cheese Mack n cheese
item.description:
@Mack_n_cheese wrote:

[quote=“Wildyscape562, post:20, topic:388788”]No. your first court date is the only one charged per offence if you were charged both at the same time then only 1 time charged even if you have 100 court dates for them charges. But if you do it again then you will be having court fees again.[/quote]oh, nvm that’s not too bad than lol.

probably about a 250$ fine… poo in my shoe.

Read full topic

item.title: Fines and stuff
item.dc:creator: @Wildyscape562 Wildyscape562
item.description:
@Wildyscape562 wrote:

No. your first court date is the only one charged per offence if you were charged both at the same time then only 1 time charged even if you have 100 court dates for them charges. But if you do it again then you will be having court fees again.

Read full topic

item.title: Fines and stuff
item.dc:creator: @Mack_n_cheese Mack n cheese
item.description:
@Mack_n_cheese wrote:

[quote=“Wildyscape562, post:18, topic:388788”]Also, do not worry, you will only be charged court fees 1 time per charge you get[/quote]so… 2 charges = a fuck load?

shit i’m gonna have to sell my xbox or shit to pay for it. i’ll tell them i can’t pay it, see what they say cuz i can’t get a job right now

Read full topic

item.title: Fines and stuff
item.dc:creator: @Wildyscape562 Wildyscape562
item.description:
@Wildyscape562 wrote:

Well lets see courtfees will be $200 to $500, posible restitution(price of items you stole *New) Probation fees depending how long your on mine are $20 a month until im off, Community Service anywhere from 25-1000 hours(ive done 400 hours so far and still counting…) not sure though ive only stolen 200 dollars worth of stuff by myself and got caught, so thats all i know, i have no clue about a group all i know is thats fer sure gang activity…

Read full topic

item.title: Fines and stuff
item.dc:creator: @IlikeArrays IlikeArrays
item.description:
@IlikeArrays wrote:

[quote=“Mack n cheese, post:7, topic:388788”][quote author=ziplock link=topic=484610.msg3551184#msg3551184 date=1301533870]
Also 3 or more people is by law considered a street gang, so you would possibly even be charged with gang activity. In Arkansas anyways.

https://sites.google.com/site/fdapwiki/main_page/gangs/definition-of-a-criminal-street-gang
[/quote]i live in arizona. they (police) didn’t mention anything about that, so i’m assuming not.[/quote]

Which part of AZ. I live there as well

Newty:

Don’t steal shit… Also, if you do don’t post information about it on here because moparisthebest has reported malicious activity to the proper police departments in the past.

When did he do this and what for?

item.description:

dont pay and deny everything

…
Anyways. If you did tell the truth the first time and you didn’t cause a fuss about it, the charges may be light, depending on if the owner/school is notified.

item.title: Fines and stuff
item.dc:creator: @Mack_n_cheese Mack n cheese
item.description:
@Mack_n_cheese wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”]Depends on all the charges, I guess. IE; breaking in to steal it, lying about stealing it, and if the owner presses charges, etc.

It might also depend on state laws as well.[/quote]@cole yea

and vain
charges are theft and trespassing for me, since my original intention wasn’t to steal, so it’s not a robbery. I didn’t lie, and told the truth the first time about what happened, and yea, it was a school, so the county is pressing charges aha

Read full topic
